Class BattleRoyaleEngine

java.lang.Object
dev.royalcore.api.engine.BattleRoyaleEngine
@MarkedForRemoval public class BattleRoyaleEngine extends Object
Legacy engine responsible for validating and registering BattleRoyale definitions.

This engine is marked for removal; use the new engine API instead where available.

  • Method Details

    • register

      public Result register(BattleRoyale battleRoyale)
      Validates and registers a BattleRoyale definition.

      This method:

      • Collects listeners, commands and recipes from all scenarios.
      • Checks required and conflicting scenarios.
      • Applies scenario border configuration and per-player behaviour.
      • Registers listeners, commands and recipes through their registries.
      Parameters:
      battleRoyale - the battle royale definition to register
      Returns:
      a Result indicating success or failure and an explanatory message

    • isDuped

      public Result isDuped(List<org.bukkit.event.Listener> listeners, org.bukkit.event.Listener listener, BattleRoyale battleRoyale)
      Checks whether a listener is already present in the given list.
      Parameters:
      listeners - the list of already collected listeners
      listener - the listener to check
      battleRoyale - the battle royale being registered
      Returns:
      a Result error if a duplicate is found, otherwise a successful result

    • isDuped

      public Result isDuped(List<com.mojang.brigadier.tree.LiteralCommandNode<io.papermc.paper.command.brigadier.CommandSourceStack>> commandNodes, com.mojang.brigadier.tree.LiteralCommandNode<io.papermc.paper.command.brigadier.CommandSourceStack> commandNode, BattleRoyale battleRoyale)
      Checks whether a command node is already present in the given list.
      Parameters:
      commandNodes - the list of already collected command nodes
      commandNode - the command node to check
      battleRoyale - the battle royale being registered
      Returns:
      a Result error if a duplicate is found, otherwise a successful result

      Parameters:

      Returns:
